Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 000018 PCR pursuant to Sections 197-c and 197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning the site selection and acquisition of real property located north of Richmond Terrace and west of the St. George Ferry Terminal, Borough of Staten Island, Council District no. 49, to facilitate the constructino of a stadium.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(2) fo the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
